title: How to Recognize Chinese Art (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
How to Recognize Chinese Art
Penguin Books | 1980 | ISBN: 0140052364 | English | 68 pages | PDF | 10.6 MB


The artistic tradition of China is the world's longest, extending from at least the third millennium before Christ to the present day. The Chinese excelled not only in sculpture, architecture, and painting but also in the applied arts of bronze ware, ceramics; jade, and lacquer. Amid such a rich profusion, this concise volume shows how to appreciate a great variety of styles and themesÃ¢â‚¬â€from the severely abstract to the naturalistic, from geometrical designs to terrifying dragons and exquisitely lowered porcelains
